channel.title: Adding Timers
channel.description:
How would I add a timer to a server without one.. Could I make it globsl (all items) or is there a easy way to make it timed on it's own? I can't figure this out, niether can any tutorial I'v seen lol. I looked on google even.. Lots of timers there :o Not concerning this though. If you got a way to add a timer just get me on msn John_95_07@hotmail.com, or post it in [Code][/.code] Form.
-Thanks, John[/code]
